gw.api.admin

Class DestinationMessageStatistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.admin.DestinationMessageStatistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.service.data.Idable, java.io.Serializable

    public class DestinationMessageStatistics
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.guidewire.pl.system.service.data.Idable, java.io.Serializable
    Represents statistics about messages in the Guidewire messaging system (see the Integration Guide for details of messaging). Each DestinationMessageStatistics object represents statistics for a particular messaging destination:
    • The destination id.
    • The destination name.
    • The destination status (such as "started" or "suspended").
    • The number of failed messages for the destination.
    • The number of retried messages for the destination.
    • The number of messages currently in flight for the destination.
    • The number of pending unsent messages for the destination.
    DestinationMessageStatistics objects are used to display messaging status in the administration UI.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
